column4: Hi, I'm sharing some folders with windows machines, I can't see mi pc on "my network places" but I still can see the files by entering in the winexlorer mi pc IP, any ideas on how to solve this?
change your samba workgroup to match the workgroup of the windows machine(s) i guess
The workgroup is properly configured, I cannot enter mi ubuntu machine by using it's network name only using it's IP
